resume.name: Massimiliano Marcon
summary: I am a Software engineer and passionate innovator specializing in **web standards** and **front-end development**, **rapid prototyping**, distributed systems and Service Oriented Architectures.
I have an extensive background in full-cycle of **software development process**, **TDD/BDD** and agile methodologies.
I am also an **Open source developer**, occasional **public speaker**, and a creative **map maker**.
interests: Rapid prototyping, digital maps, location services

description: Collaborates with external agencies and internal business units to define and evangelize technical guidelines and to ensure that projects are implemented with high quality standards.

experience.position: Senior engineer and Dev Lead at HERE
description: Full stack software developer, architect, rapid prototyper, android developer and lead engineer.
Full stack software engineer, enthusiastic innovator, research week winner, tech talker, always building the next cool feature for Nokia's location platform [HERE](https://www.here.com).
Often busy with some rapid prototyping to explore new directions for the product, to draft new functionalities or just to challenge the *status quo*.
more: **Rapid prototyping engineer**. Member of a rapid prototyping team that specializes in creating prototypes for future HERE products both for desktop as well as for mobile devices.

**Public speaker, evangelist**. In addition to speaking at several internal tech talks, I was a speaker at [Frontend Conference Zurich 2013](http://www.frontendconf.ch/) with [a presentation about lazy loading/on demand loading](http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2012/12/22/talks-to-help-you-become-a-better-front-end-engineer-in-2013/) of JavaScript code and at [jsday 2013](http://2013.jsday.it/). I also organized a few hackathons to familiarize developers with Nokia's APIs for the web and Windows Phone 8.

**Full-stack web engineer**. Worked on front-end and back-end components for [City Pages](http://here.com/germany/berlin) and [Place Pages](http://here.com/germany/berlin/landmark-attraction/brandenburger-tor--276u33db-af7d14d928be47db887a1b606881efce) for [HERE](http://here.com).

**Open source developer and contributor**. Developed [jHERE](http://jhere.net), an open source jQuery/Zepto.js plugin that provides a super simple API to embed maps on a website or web application. Contributed to open source projects such as Tire.js and node-timezone.

experience.position: Research Associate, R&D Engineer at IHMC
description: R&D Engineer with expertise in web technologies, distributed systems, Service Oriented Architectures, network protocols and simulations.
Researcher, Web engineer, iOS application maker.
more: **Front-end developer** and **lead engineer** for several web projects related to concept mapping.

**Project leader** and **software architect** for a map-centered web application for the creation of real-world enterprise network simulations to support a research effort in the ﬁeld of intrusion detection and cyber-security.
**iOS developer** for a NASA sponsored iPad application that presents all the different aspects of human space exploration to the user through the use of concept mapping.

**R&D Engineer** assigned to the design and implementation of network communication protocols, cross-layer frameworks, QoS monitoring and federation strategies for tactical information networks in collaboration with major organizations such as BBN Technologies, Boeing and the Air Force Research Lab.
Coauthor of several conference and journal publications.
